title: Glyphs, shapes, fonts, signed distance fields.

media:group.media:title: Glyphs, shapes, fonts, signed distance fields.
media:group.media:description:
Old but gold, in this video I explain how to generate and use signed distance field textures for rendering sharp vector-like shapes such as text and graphics.

References:
https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/apps/valve/2007/SIGGRAPH2007_AlphaTestedMagnification.pdf
https://shaderbits.com/blog/various-distance-field-generation-techniques

Me:

Software used for this video:
Material Maker https://rodzilla.itch.io/material-maker
Blender 2.8 https://www.blender.org/
Godot 3.2 https://godotengine.org/
OBS https://obsproject.com/
Kdenlive https://kdenlive.org/en/
